techmeme.title: AI threatens to upend India's $250B outsourcing industry, as companies plan to automate BPO; HSBC says 80%+ of the S&P 500 outsource some operations to India (Megha Mandavia/Wall Street Journal)
A profile of Yang Zhilin, the founder and CEO of China's highest-valued AI unicorn Moonshot, who studied at Carnegie Mellon University and worked at Huawei (Ben Jiang/South China Morning Post)
Sony reports Q1 revenue up 2% YoY to ~$20.5B, vs. ~$19.31B est., operating profit up 10% YoY to ~$1.92B, vs. $1.89B est., and 2.4M PS5 sales, down from 3.3M YoY (Ryan Browne/CNBC)
Global crypto hubs like Hong Kong and Dubai face a challenging outlook, as the brightening US political backdrop for crypto attracts companies and investors (Bloomberg)
A profile of Kakao founder Kim Beom-su, who South Korea arrested in July 2024 on stock manipulation charges relating to Kakao's takeover of a K-pop agency (Financial Times)
